resources.title: Student Discounts
resources.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet of tech-related student discounts. Includes software, subscriptions, hardware, and cloud services available to students.

resources.title: Coding Interview University
resources.description: Complete computer science study plan to become a software engineer. Multi-month study plan for going from web developer to software engineer at a large company.

resources.title: Developer Roadmap
resources.description: Interactive roadmaps, guides and educational content to help developers pick up a path and guide their learnings. Covers frontend, backend, DevOps, and more.

resources.title: 2026 SWE College Jobs
resources.description: Curated list of full-time software engineering positions for new college graduates in 2026. Regularly updated with new opportunities and application deadlines.

resources.title: Summer 2026 Internships (vanshb03)
resources.description: Comprehensive collection of summer 2026 tech internship opportunities. Includes application links, deadlines, and location information for various companies.

resources.title: Summer 2026 Internships (SimplifyJobs)
resources.description: Maintained by SimplifyJobs, this repository tracks summer 2026 tech internship postings with quick apply links and regular updates.
